1000053838.title: Baby
1000053838.description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.

1000188983.title: Kanupapa
1000188983.description: A blind man becomes the prime suspect in a murder case. But he also has to protect the victim's daughter and prove his innocence. How will he get out of this?

1000212789.title: Raid
1000212789.description: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

1000218684.title: Traffic
1000218684.description: A traffic constable accepts the challenge of traversing 150 km by road to transport a donor's heart for an immediate transplant. Inspired by a true event.
1000218684.detail: Moderate Sexual references, Sexual humor, Mild Violence

1000230936.title: Sammohanam
1000230936.description: Vijay, an illustrator, hates the world of films and the people involved. But, in a twist of fate, he falls for Sameera, an actress. Will he forgo his prejudice?

1000230995.title: Gayatri
1000230995.description: Sivaji reunites with his daughter who was missing for two decades. On learning that she was kidnapped by his lookalike, Sivaji decides to bring him to book.

1000233697.title: Total Dhamaal
1000233697.description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

1000239103.title: De De Pyaar De
1000239103.description: 50-year-old Ashish has fallen in love with Ayesha, who is half his age. Their romance turns into a comedy, when he takes her to meet his parents and ex-wife.

1260011536.title: Mission Mangal
1260011536.description: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.
1260011536.detail: Mild violence, Mild sexual content and references

1260012713.title: Chhichhore
1260012713.description: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.
1260012713.crisp: Some Sexual References, Some Mature Content

1260014263.title: Housefull 4
1260014263.description: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

1260022117.title: Tanhaji
1260022117.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

1260091273.title: Shane
1260091273.description: The movie is the exploration of the rise of one of the greatest cricket players the world has known, Shane Warne.
1260091273.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Drug References

1260109951.title: Baba Baby O
1260109951.description: In his 40s, Megh becomes a single father with two children through surrogacy. Things take an interesting turn when he falls in love with Brishti.

1260123526.title: Sita Ramam
1260123526.description: On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.

1260124210.title: Freddy
1260124210.description: Introverted and awkward Dr Freddy Ginwala desperately searches for a soulmate. When he finally finds her, the relationship becomes as painful as a root canal.
1260124210.crisp: Violence, Scenes of Intimacy, Coarse Language, Gore, Some Disturbing Scenes

1260124584.title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey
1260124584.description: Being brought up in a conservative family, Jaya feels even more trapped when she marries Rajesh, a male chauvinist. How will she break free from these shackles?
1260124584.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Violence, Some Mature Content, Action Sequences

1260125572.title: Govinda Naam Mera
1260125572.description: Wedged between a court case, a bad marriage and his girlfriend, Govinda Waghmare gets further entangled in incidents complicating his already tangled world.
1260125572.crisp: Sexual Humour, Coarse Language, Drug References

1260126754.title: Butterfly
1260126754.description: While trying to rescue her sister's kids from kidnappers, Geetha excavates shocking secrets about her dubious neighbours. What are they hiding?

1770000948.title: Avatar
1770000948.description: Former Marine Jake Sully is deployed as an Avatar on a mission to Pandora but, he ultimately finds himself torn between two worlds.
